1.title: The Interview

episode of.title: Uncle Frank's Guide to Being a Man (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Meet Uncle Frank. He's an average Joe trying to teach his young nephew, Tim, the ways of the world. Frank's advice may be sage, but Tim is a very strange boy. In this episode, Uncle Frank extols his wisdom on the art of the interview; Tim endeavors to make him proud.

2.title: The Science Fair

episode of.title: Uncle Frank's Guide to Being a Man (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Meet Uncle Frank. He's an average Joe trying to teach his young nephew, Tim, the ways of the world. Frank's advice may be sage, but Tim is a very strange boy. In this episode, Uncle Frank extols his wisdom on how to succeed in school; Tim endeavors to make him proud.

3.title: Asking Out a Girl

episode of.title: Uncle Frank's Guide to Being a Man (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Meet Uncle Frank. He's an average Joe trying to teach his young nephew, Tim, the ways of the world. Frank's advice may be sage, but Tim is a very strange boy. In this episode, Uncle Frank extols his wisdom on how to get the girl; Tim endeavors to make him proud.

imdb.title: Uncle Frank's Guide to Being a Man
akas: Uncle Frank's Guide to Being a Man (United States)
plot: Meet Uncle Frank. He's an average Joe trying to teach his young nephew, Tim, the ways of the world. Frank's advice may be sage, but Tim is a very strange boy. Tim learns life's ropes from his favorite Uncle.::Kitty Bow Tie
